BI Portfolio

Disclaimer

By nature, it is challenging to build a business intelligence portfolio since most BI work is generated for internal company use. Examples on this page are a small subset of my work that is publicly available. I hope to add more to this portfolio in the near future.

Personal Power BI Project - Utah Air Quality

Warning

This report is no longer updated as of Nov 30, 2022.

Utah intermittently has some of the worst air quality in the United States due to the bowl-shaped topography of the Wasatch Front, inversion effects, and wildfires.

In April 2022, I created a Power BI report to analyze recent and historical air quality trends in Utah. Using Microsoft Azure cloud services, I set up a pipeline to scrape data from EPA and AirNow.gov APIs. The report automatically refreshed with new data each morning.

Utah Transit Authority - Free Fare February Report

UTA declared “Free Fare February” (FFF) in 2022, granting free access to all public transit modes (bus, light rail, commuter rail, and more). A large increase in ridership (>20%) was observed as a result, leading to nationwide interest in a post-mortem report.

Using Power BI, I generated all the data visualizations for the FFF report. I also read and manually categorized about 2,000 customer comments for sentiment analysis.

This website is built with and hosted via GitHub and Netlify
